display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with >=4% oxygen desaturation or with arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=4% oxygen desaturation or with arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + carba4 + caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 + oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 ) / slpprdp
